===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[woman]]

====Usage notes====
* When referring to an adult female in a neutral sense, {{zh-l|婦女}} and {{zh-l|女的}} are often preferred to the synonym {{zh-l|女人}} which can carry potentially offensive connotations of a female of low social standing or worth (similar to {{m|en|woman}} and {{m|en|lady}} in English).

====Synonyms====
* {{zh-l|女的}}
* {{zh-l|女人}}
* {{zh-l|女子}}
